downloadTitle: Windows Mobile Updates for Daylight Saving Time (Windows Mobile 2003 for Smartphone)
downloadDescription: This is the Microsoft Mobile update to address DST related issues in 2007.
detailsSection: This release updates time zone registry data for US, Canada, Mexico DST related issues in 2007. For complete details regarding the updates in this release, please download the following DST2007_SP.CAB file below.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the download above to download the file.
2. Please copy the file to the device and click on it to execute it. (There are multiple ways to copy a file to the device - one of them is to use Activesync).
